meanings.sent1: Her shirt's dyeability allowed it to change colors easily.
meanings.sent2: The fabric's dyeability made it perfect for tie-dyeing.
meanings.sent3: The dyeability of the dress turned out to be quite useful for the costume party.
meanings.sent4: The dyeability of the curtains transformed the room into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The dyeability of the material was so impressive that it amazed everyone who saw it.

meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be dyed.
meanings.sent1: The dyeability of the fabric determined its suitability for the project.
meanings.sent2: We tested the dyeability of different fabrics before starting the art class.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected dyeability of the socks led to a fun tie-dye experiment.
meanings.sent4: The dyeability of the hair dye was crucial for achieving the desired color.
meanings.sent5: The dyeability of the cloth was so high that it absorbed the color instantly.
